recipes.name: Grilled Chicken Salad
recipes.description: A delightful Grilled Chicken Salad featuring succulent chicken strips seasoned with garlic, served on a bed of mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and feta cheese. Drizzled with balsamic vinaigrette, it's a perfect balance of flavors.
instructions: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
Brush chicken breasts with olive oil and season with salt, pepper, and garlic powder.
Grill chicken for 6-7 minutes per side or until fully cooked.
Let chicken rest for a few minutes, then slice into strips.
In a large bowl, combine salad greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and feta cheese.
Top the salad with grilled chicken strips.
Drizzle balsamic vinaigrette dressing over the salad.
Toss everything together gently and serve immediately.

recipes.name: Vegetarian Stir-Fry
recipes.description: Dive into a world of flavors with this Vegetarian Stir-Fry. Tofu, vibrant vegetables, and a soy-sesame sauce come together in a wok for a quick and healthy meal, served over brown rice.
instructions: In a wok or large skillet, heat vegetable oil over medium-high heat.
Add ginger and garlic, sauté for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
Add tofu cubes and stir-fry until golden brown.
Add broccoli, bell pepper, carrot, and snap peas to the wok.
Stir-fry the vegetables for 3-4 minutes until they are tender-crisp.
In a small bowl, mix soy sauce and sesame oil.
Pour the sauce over the vegetables and tofu. Stir to combine.
Serve the stir-fry over cooked brown rice.

recipes.name: Banana Chocolate Chip Muffins
recipes.description: Indulge in the sweetness of Banana Chocolate Chip Muffins. Moist and flavorful, these muffins are a perfect blend of ripe bananas, chocolate chips, and a touch of vanilla, making them a delightful treat.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C). Line a muffin tin with paper liners.
In a bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
In another bowl, beat melted butter, granulated sugar, and brown sugar until well combined.
Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition.
Stir in mashed bananas and vanilla extract.
Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, mixing until just combined.
Fold in chocolate chips.
Spoon the batter into the muffin cups, filling each about two-thirds full.
Bake for 18-20 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
Allow muffins to cool in the tin for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.

recipes.name: Caprese Salad
recipes.description: Experience the simplicity and freshness of a Caprese Salad. Juicy cherry tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, and torn basil leaves are drizzled with balsamic glaze and olive oil, creating a classic and elegant dish.
instructions: In a large bowl, combine cherry tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, and torn basil leaves.
Drizzle with balsamic glaze and extra-virgin olive oil.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Toss gently to combine and serve immediately.

recipes.name: Shrimp Scampi Pasta
recipes.description: Savor the flavors of Shrimp Scampi Pasta. Succulent shrimp, garlic-infused butter, and a hint of red pepper flakes come together in a delightful pasta dish, finished with a squeeze of lemon and fresh parsley.
ingredients: 1 lb large shrimp, peeled and deveined
Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook linguine pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
In a large skillet, heat butter and olive oil over medium-high heat.
Add minced garlic and red pepper flakes, sauté until garlic is fragrant.
Add shrimp to the skillet and cook until pink, about 2-3 minutes per side.
Pour in chicken broth and lemon juice. Season with salt and black pepper.
Add cooked pasta to the skillet, tossing to coat in the sauce.
Garnish with chopped fresh parsley and serve immediately.

recipes.name: Vegetable Curry
recipes.description: Enjoy a hearty Vegetable Curry, where cauliflower, carrots, bell peppers, potatoes, and green beans are simmered in coconut milk and aromatic spices. Serve over rice for a satisfying and flavorful meal.
instructions: In a large pot, heat vegetable oil over medium heat.
Add chopped onions, garlic, and ginger. Sauté until onions are translucent.
Add curry powder and stir to coat the vegetables.
Add cauliflower, carrots, bell peppers, potatoes, and green beans. Mix well.
Pour in coconut milk and bring to a simmer. Cover and cook until vegetables are tender.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve the vegetable curry over rice or your preferred grain.

recipes.name: Mango Salsa Chicken
recipes.description: Elevate your chicken dinner with Mango Salsa Chicken. Juicy chicken breasts are topped with a vibrant mango salsa, creating a harmonious blend of sweet and savory flavors.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper.
In a bowl, combine diced mango, red bell pepper, red onion, jalapeño, cilantro, and lime juice.
Heat olive oil in an oven-safe skillet over medium-high heat.
Sear chicken breasts on both sides until golden brown.
Top each chicken breast with mango salsa.
Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and bake for 20-25 minutes or until chicken is cooked through.
Serve the mango salsa chicken over rice or quinoa.

recipes.name: Quinoa Salad with Avocado and Black Beans
recipes.description: Embrace a nutritious Quinoa Salad loaded with black beans, corn, avocado, cherry tomatoes, and red onion. Drizzled with a zesty lime dressing, it's a refreshing and wholesome dish.
ingredients: 1 can (15 oz) black beans, drained and rinsed
1 cup corn kernels, fresh or frozen
instructions: In a large bowl, combine cooked quinoa, black beans, corn, diced avocado, cherry tomatoes, and red onion.
In a small bowl, whisk together lime juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Pour the dressing over the quinoa mixture and toss gently to combine.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve chilled.

recipes.name: Teriyaki Salmon
recipes.description: Delight in Teriyaki Salmon, featuring succulent salmon fillets glazed with a savory teriyaki sauce. Garnished with sesame seeds and green onions, it's a perfect balance of sweet and savory.
ingredients: Sesame seeds and green onions for garnish
Cooked white or brown rice for serving
instructions: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
In a bowl, whisk together soy sauce, honey, rice vinegar, sesame oil, minced garlic, and grated ginger.
Place salmon fillets in a baking dish and pour the teriyaki sauce over them.
Bake for 15-18 minutes or until salmon is cooked through.
Garnish with sesame seeds and sliced green onions.
Serve the teriyaki salmon over cooked rice.

recipes.name: Pesto Pasta with Cherry Tomatoes
recipes.description: Dive into a bowl of Pesto Pasta with Cherry Tomatoes. Penne pasta is coated in a flavorful basil pesto sauce and tossed with halved cherry tomatoes for a burst of freshness.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook penne pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
In a food processor, combine fresh basil, pine nuts, grated Parmesan, and minced garlic.
Pulse until ingredients are finely chopped.
With the food processor running, slowly pour in the olive oil until a smooth pesto sauce forms.
Toss the cooked penne pasta with the pesto sauce and halved cherry tomatoes.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Serve the pesto pasta with additional Parmesan if desired.
